arm.name: arm
arm.transformationDescription:
Within a matter of moments, they've changed into slender arms not too unlike those of a normal human, albeit with thin webbing partially connecting the fingers on each hand.
As the transformation comes to an end, [npc.nameIsFull] left with anthropomorphic, [style.boldOctopus(octopus-like arms and hands)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription].
arm.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] [npc.armRows] arms, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription(true)]. [npc.Her] hands are formed into anthropomorphic, octopus-like hands, complete with webbing stretching to the first knuckle of each finger.
